Package viewers

Class DoctorView

Object
DoctorView
All Implemented Interfaces:
ViewInterface
public class DoctorView extends Object implements ViewInterface
The `DoctorView` class represents the interface for doctors to interact with the hospital management system. It provides functionality for viewing and updating patient records, managing personal schedules, setting availability, handling appointment requests, and recording appointment outcomes.
